titles.title: To amend the Small Business Act to provide loans to eligible small business concerns for energy costs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary: 6/26/2001--Introduced. Amends the Small Business Act to authorize the Small Business Administration to make loans to eligible small businesses to finance energy costs for January 1, 2001, through August 30, 2002. Makes eligible for such loans small businesses located in a State in which wholesale energy costs increased by 150 percent or more during such period or any part of such period.
